divs: Sighting DetailsI was called outside by my son and his friend. I went outside and saw a straight line of orbs in the sky. Then it split and it then separated into three different triangles. I then called my husband outside and he witnessed them moving across the sky. I told my son to grab the camera to see if I could take a picture before it disappeared. My spouse took the photos and wished I could of zoomed in more. I felt amazed I only heard of these things happening on TV. I searched the web for a site to report it and here I am.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There was one other sighting in Las Vegas on or around April 7th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
